markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6307) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 196 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247)

</column>

---

You're exceptional in your use of two weapons. You gain the [Double Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=4769) fighter feat.

<title level="2">Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication leads to...</title>
[Dual Onslaught](/Feats.aspx?ID=6312), [Dual Thrower](/Feats.aspx?ID=6308), [Dual-Weapon Blitz](/Feats.aspx?ID=6311), [Dual-Weapon Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=6309), [Flensing Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=6310)
name: Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication
